subject: Hello
body:
Hello
  It has been a long time since you replied to any of our emails. Your loan is still pending and needs to be activated for transfer immediately so you can receive your loan.
  Please do get back to us so we can proceed on how to finalize the transfer of 750,000 ZAR into your account
   I sincerely wait for your reply,
   Mr. Michael

subject: Re:   Hello
body:
Hello Mr. Michael,

Thank you for reaching out. I appreciate the update regarding my pending loan. Could you please provide me with more details on the next steps to finalize the transfer of ZAR into my account? I want to ensure that everything is in order before proceeding.

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Georgia

subject: Re: Hello
body:
Dear Customer,

             We commend your swift response to our loan advert.
Welcome to  STRATTON
FINANCE FIRM  . Take a minute to read through the loan briefing below
before filling up the application.

*BRIEFING ON THE LOAN*

                  STRATTON FINANCE FIRM offers loans at 3% interest rate
per month. Our loan amount ranges from  a minimum of $5,000.00 USD to a
maximum of $5,000,000.00 USD. The repayment is monthly and it begins two
months after the borrower has received his/her loan.You shouldn't worry
about your credit score as we do not check your credit score to get you
approved.

* LOAN APPLICATION: To apply, CLICK HERE
<https://www.emailmeform.com/builder/form/U2afe0kdKfjc6bpZTb19Q> TO FILL
OUT THE FORM  Once you submit your application information online, we will
send the loan terms and agreement contract to your email for signing.

You will get a preliminary and swift response from us as soon as you send
us the application info as stated above. In other words, you will get the
loan terms and conditions soon after you fill up the application above.

Warm Regards.

Mr. Michael
www.strattonfinance.com.au

subject: Re: Hello
body:
Hello! Thank you for sharing this information about the loan options available at STRATTON FINANCE FIRM. Can you tell me more about the interest rates and any additional fees associated with the loans? I'm interested in learning more before considering applying.

Best wishes,
Georgia

subject: Re: Hello
body:
Hello Georgia

   Inregards to your mail, we offer loans at 3% monthly with no extra
charge. Please note that the fees involved with this loan is called the NON/
COLLATERAL deposit which is to be paid just once after which no other
payment will be required from you.

  The reason why you will be required to make a down deposit is because
this loan is an unsecured loan which means no collateral involved and most
interesting part is that the down deposit made by you will be sent back to
you after the loan program but should incase you fail to payback the
loan,it will be submitted in the bank which will yield great profit in
return. It is just an insurance policy for the company.

   I hope you understand the reason for asking for a down payment.

    Warm Regards.
    Mr. Michael

body:

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Georgia

subject: Re: Hello
body:
Bank to Bank Transfer:
The transfer of the loan shall be via telegraphic swift wire transfer into
the corresponding/designated bank account for your loan transfer.

PAYMENT AND REPAYMENT:
This loan and credit company agrees to the loan agreement above and
promises to disburse your loan to you via bank-to-bank wire transfer to
your designated account. Bank wire transfer instruction will be provided to
you for the repayment of the loan as agreed and stated in the loan terms
and condition /repayment schedule.

LOAN CLOSING:
The loan transfer and closing process will commence immediately after the
signing and rectification of this loan agreement document by all the
parties therein.

GUARANTEE:
This loan company hereby irrevocably guarantees the honor, transfer and
closing of your approved loan to you at the closing of this transaction.

ASSIGNMENT AND DELEGATION:
Neither party shall assign or delegate this agreement or any right, duties
or obligation hereunder to another person/ or entity without prior express
written approval of the other party.

ENTIRE AGREEMENT:
This loan agreement document contains the entire agreement and
understanding concerning the subject matter thereof and supersedes and
replaces all prior negotiations, proposals, and actual agreement, written
or oral. Neither of the parties may individually alter, amend, nor modify
this agreement except by an instrument in writing signed by either parties
or their duly authorized representative.

NO WAIVER OF RIGHT:
Either party's failure to insist on strict performance of any provision of
this agreement shall not be deemed a waiver of any of its right, nor shall
it relieve the other party from performing any subsequent obligation
strictly in accordance with terms of this written agreement. No waiver
shall be effective unless it is in writing and signed by the party against
whom the enforcement is sought.

Early Payment Penalty:
We do not accept part or lump sum payments unless it is in accordance with
your right to settle the loan early in accordance with the Consumer Credit
Act 1974. In situations whereby the party of the 2nd Part/Borrower is able
to pay off both the principal loan and accrue interest amount before the
end of the loan term, there shall be no penalty contrary to the early
payment of the loan and the borrower shall not Be penalized for early loan
repayment for whatsoever reason (s) because your ability and capability to
repay both the loan and accrue interest before the end of the loan term is
your choice.

subject: Re: Hello
body:

subject: Re: Hello
body:
Hello Georgia, I'm glad you're interested! The loan we offer has a competitive interest rate that varies based on the amount borrowed and your credit score. Repayment terms are flexible and can be tailored to suit your financial situation. As for additional fees, there may be some processing fees involved, but they are minimal compared to the benefits of the loan. Is there anything else you would like to know about our loan options?

Best wishes,
Georgia

subject: Re: Hello
body:
Hello Georgia, I'm glad you're interested! The loan we offer has a competitive interest rate that varies based on the amount borrowed and your credit score. Repayment terms are flexible, ranging from 6 months to 5 years. There are no hidden fees involved, just a one-time processing fee. Let me know if you'd like more information or have any other questions!

Best wishes,
Georgia
